boardgame.name: Parfum
boardgame.description: Who will be the most successful perfumer? Parfum takes the players to the wonderful world of fragrances. Using ingredients like vanilla, lavender, or violets, the players distill precious essences in order to create unique perfumes. Only the player catering to their clientele's preferences will be able to sell their perfume. Each customer favors a specific fragrance, which must be contained in a flask to induce them to buy it._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 2 - A Walk on the Wild Side
Episode 89- Great Western Trail and 2017 Predictions/Resolutions
Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 468 - Parfum, Downtown, and Fidelitas
